oai_dc:dc.dc:title: STATISTICAL-MECHANICS OF ANTIBODY-ANTIGEN BINDING - AFFINITY ANALYSIS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JOSHI, RR
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A model of the statistical mechanics of antibody-antigen binding is presented. A relation between the mutual affinity of these molecules and the most probable state of their bound complexes is derived. Analysis of the involved nonlinear optimization problem is presented along with some applied computational results. Importance of the approach for other applications is highlighted.
